languages.text: "Без нее я ощущаю себя освежеванным. Недавно я пытался вспомнить, каково это — жить без шкуры... Не могу. Слишком много минуло лет".
"I feel flayed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."
languages.original_text: "Без нее я ощущаю себя освежеванным. Недавно я пытался вспомнить, каково это — жить без шкуры... Не могу. Слишком много минуло лет".

traits.locale_text: "I feel refreshed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "I feel refreshed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "I feel refreshed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "I feel flayed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: “失去它的日子，感觉就像是被剥了皮一样。我最近一直在努力回想，没有这张狼皮的生活是什么样子……但我想不起来，那已经是太久以前了。”
languages.original_text: "I feel flayed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."

traits.locale_text: “没披着它的这段时间，让我感觉神清气爽。我最近一直在努力回想，没有这张狼皮的生活是什么样子……但我想不起来，那已经是太久以前了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「そいつがないと皮が剥がれたような気分だよ。皮膚なしで生きるとはどんなものか、最近は思い出すようにしてるが…ダメだな。すっかり昔のことになっちまった」
languages.original_text: "I feel flayed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."

traits.locale_text: 「そいつがないと気分爽快だよ。皮膚なしで生きるとはどんなものか、最近は思い出すようにしてるが…ダメだな。すっかり昔のことになっちまった」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Me siento desollado sin ella. Últimamente he intentado recordar lo que es vivir sin esta piel... y no podía. Habían pasado demasiados años».
languages.original_text: "I feel flayed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."

traits.locale_text: «Me siento desollado sin ella. Últimamente he intentado recordar lo que es vivir sin esta piel... y no podía. Habían pasado demasiados años».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Je me sens comme écorché sans elle. J'ai récemment tenté de me rappeler à quoi ressemble une vie sans cette seconde peau... mais c'est impossible. Trop d'années se sont écoulées. »
languages.original_text: "I feel flayed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."

traits.locale_text: « Je me sens comme écorché sans elle. J'ai récemment tenté de me rappeler à quoi ressemble une vie sans cette seconde peau... mais c'est impossible. Trop d'années se sont écoulées. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Ohne sie fühle ich mich wie gehäutet. Ich habe versucht, mich an ein Leben ohne Haut zu erinnern ... Es geht nicht. Zu viele Jahre sind seitdem vergangen."
languages.original_text: "I feel flayed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."

traits.locale_text: "Ohne sie fühle ich mich erfrischt. Ich habe versucht, mich an ein Leben ohne Haut zu erinnern ... Es geht nicht. Zu viele Jahre sind seitdem vergangen."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Onsuz çıplak hissediyorum. Son zamanlarda derisiz yaşamanın nasıl olduğunu hatırlamaya çalışıyorum ama başaramıyorum. Uzun yıllar oldu."
languages.original_text: "I feel flayed without it. Recently I have been trying to remember what it is like to live without a skin... I can't. Too many years have passed."

traits.locale_text: "Onsuz çıplak hissediyorum. Son zamanlarda bir deriye sahip olmadan yaşamanın nasıl olduğunu hatırlamaya çalışıyorum ama hatırlayamıyorum. Üzerinden uzun yıllar geçti."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
